content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Bad Fall You fall prone and are slowed 1 until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Spraining Shot Until healed, you take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to your land Speed and are clumsy 1.

Ranged
Bad Jam You are clumsy 1 and enfeebled 2.

Unarmed
Exploding Skull You must attempt a Fortitude save. If you succeed, you take 3d6 mental damage. If you fail, your head explodes and you die.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #3
